Class PoisedInputChecks

java.lang.Object
PoisedInputChecks
Direct Known Subclasses:
PoisedMenu, Projects
public class PoisedInputChecks
extends java.lang.Object
PoisedInputChecks is the Poised Project superclass.

This class contains three check methods for different user inputs. These methods are inherited by the three subclasses of the program to ensure all user input is correctly checked.

Author:
Y

    • floatCheck

      public static float floatCheck​(java.lang.String type)
      This method verifies user input when asked to enter a float number (i.e. number with decimal point).
      Parameters:
      type - type describes the input required for the user to enter
      Returns:
      returns the verified output float
